metadata.title: CVE-2016-8679 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The _dwarf_get_size_of_val function in libdwarf/dwarf_util.c in Libdwarfbefore 20161124 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) by calling the dwarfdump command on a crafted file.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
